snippet.title: Mega-CD Longplay [017] Tomcat Alley
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by MadMatty

Alternate video of the Sega CD Game Tomcat Alley played on Hard Difficulty.  I played hard to see if the sega rule of extra fmv on higher difficulty rule applied for this game, which it didnt.....  All i noticed that change was more enemy to shoot meaning make every shot count as any missis will likely leave you short and fail the mission.

It was still worth uploading the video as this one includes the extra 'Rescue Mission' which you get if you fail to protect ratchet in mission 4.  The only annoyance is that you have to play through mission 4 again.  Any fails after this point is an instant game over though.

00:00 Intro + Mission 1
06:54 Mission 2
14:38 Mission 3
32:41 Mission 4 (Fail)
28:28 Rescue Mission
37:32 Mission 4
49:02 Mission 5
01:00:24 Mission 6 (59:59) -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
